data.name: Foto Babes
data.detailed_description:
We are just two friendly apes who learned how to make games in our free time and now love to bring our often crazy ideas to live in all kinds of games. Please expect our games to be smaller, raw experiences. We always love to chat with you guys and greatly appreciate all of your feedback in order to become better game creators. Just tell us your questions or ideas on the forums, Twitter or Facebook. If you encounter bugs or any problems, we will do all we can to ensure the best support that a drunken ape could possibly give. Have fun playing - DRUNKEN APES



It's a beautiful day... you open your eyes and finally know what to do with your unlimited amount of free time...
You are not quite sure why it took you so long to realize but you finally know what your destiny is... you know what you have been born to do...
For the first time in years you do don't go straight to your computer but rather grab a strange device from the cupboard right next to it... a thing that you haven't touched in years... but that will prove to become your best friend very soon...

You open the curtain and see the sun shining outside and - oh wow how did you not realize this all your life - you life in a wonderful beach city which hot chicks in bikinis literally everywhere. In your right hand you are still holding the weird foreign, device... it is... a camera.

After all this years everything is perfect... perfect weather, perfect girls, perfect camera, perfect time to take some perfect pictures of the perfect chicks outside!

It's your time to get the pictures you never knew you needed.




SO what's gonna happen, you ask? Oh don't worry once you are outside there is plenty to do:

üî∏ Discover and photograph hot babes in 4 different worlds.
üî∏ Become a hot mess of a photo babe photographer in 5 different game modes.
üî∏ Find the foto babes and take cool pictures in the hide and seek mode.
üî∏ Get the babes before they are gone in the cat walk mode.
üî∏ Escape the evil battle babes in the battle babe mode.
üî∏ Meet your giant idole babes in the "attack on babes" mode.
üî∏ Show of your skills in the infinity battle babes mode.
üî∏ Discover and photograph countless hot and super sweet girls
üî∏ Unlock more content and levels by finishing your quests
üî∏ Unlock the super hot photo-booth

data.short_description: Discover and photograph the hottest bikini babes you can imagine in 4 different, beachy locations. Escape the battle babes, find the sweet and shy babes in "hide and seek", relax with the catwalk babes and show of your skill in the infinity mode. Be ready to take the hottest picture of your life!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX600 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Babe giggles require sound.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hot babes will be even hotter with a hot graphic card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound is sexy!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Cute girls will be rendered so better have one or you won't see anything.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Babe giggles require sound.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X
  • Processor: i7 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: The better the graphic the hotter the girls ;)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound is sexy!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
The game does evolve around taking photos of women in bikinis. 


Besides that there are sequences where you will be chased by weaponized women.
